Title: Requires ad hoc members to be appointed in order to constitute a quorum
Summary: Requires ad hoc members to be appointed in order to constitute a quorum on the board of electric generating facilities; includes ad hoc members as part of the board.
LawCode: Amd ยง161, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to the need of ad hoc members to be appointed to constitute a quorum on the board of electric generating facilities
